name: Hot Hook
description:
Hot Hook is a 2D endless runner. You play as an ember of fire whose job is to extinguish as many water elementals as possible.

The player must use the grappling hook to not only manoeuvre the level but also to kill and score the elements of water.

PRECISION IS KEY!

This project is for the ACM Game Jam 2021

Theme: One Action Many Uses

W,A,S,D == Move

Space Bar == Jump

Left Mouse Button == To use Grappling Hook

R == Reload Game

Developed by Panikos Theodosiou
